title: Backend Developer Python
description:
Nous recherchons un développeur backend Python expérimenté pour rejoindre notre équipe dynamique. Vous travaillerez sur des APIs REST avec Django et FastAPI, gérerez des bases de données PostgreSQL, et contribuerez à notre architecture microservices.

Responsabilités:
- Développer et maintenir des APIs REST
- Optimiser les performances des bases de données
- Participer aux code reviews
- Collaborer avec l'équipe frontend

Environnement technique: Python, Django, FastAPI, PostgreSQL, Docker, Kubernetes

job_description:
Join our team as a Full Stack Developer! We are looking for someone with strong experience in React and Node.js. English is required for international collaboration.

What you'll do:
- Build responsive web applications
- Design and implement REST APIs
- Work with cloud services (AWS)
- Mentor junior developers

Requirements:
- 3+ years experience in web development
- Strong JavaScript/TypeScript skills
- Experience with React and Node.js
- Fluent in English

title: Software Engineer
description:
We are seeking a talented Software Engineer to join our fintech team in London. You will work on cutting-edge financial applications using modern technologies.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable systems
- Work on real-time trading platforms
- Ensure security and compliance
- Participate in agile ceremonies

Requirements:
- Bachelor's degree in Computer Science
- 4+ years of software development experience
- Experience with Java or Python
- Knowledge of financial systems is a plus
